body:
From https://docs.python.org/3/library/collections.html:

> _Deprecated since version 3.3, will be removed in version 3.10:_ Moved [Collections Abstract Base Classes](https://docs.python.org/3/library/collections.abc.html#collections-abstract-base-classes) to the [`collections.abc`](https://docs.python.org/3/library/collections.abc.html#module-collections.abc) module. For backwards compatibility, they continue to be visible in this module through Python 3.9.

Closes #20434

@mrmundt
title: Python 3.10 support: collections.abc
